rukus.text: wo Allah hai jis ne tumhaare liye, kaan aur aankhe aur dil paida kiye, magar tum bahuth hee kam shukr karte ho
aur wahi hai jis ne tumhe paida kar ke zameen mein phaila diya aur osi ki taraf tum jama kiye jaoge
aur ye wahi hai jo jilaata aur maarta hai aur raath din ke raddo badal ka muqtaar bhi wahi hai, kya tum ko samajh boojh nahi
balke un logo ne bhi waisi hee baath kahi, jo agle kehte chale aaye
ke kya jab hum mar kar mitthi aur haddi ho jayenge, kya phir bhi hum zaroor uthaaye jayenge
hum se aur hamaare baap dadaao se, pehle hee se ye waada hota chala ayaa hai, kuch nahi, ye to sirf agle logo ke afsaane hai
pochiye to sahih, ke zameen aur us ki kul cheeze kis ki hai? batlaao agar jaante ho
fauran jawaab denge ke Allah ki, keh dijiye ke phir tum nasihath kyo nahi haasil karte
daryaaft ki jiye ke saatho asmaano ka aur bahuth ba azmath arsh ka rab kaun hai
wo log jawaab denge ke Allah hee hai, keh dijiye ke phir tum kyo nahi darte
pochiye ke tamaam cheezo ka eqtiyaar kis ke haath mein hai? ao panaah deta hai aur jis ke muqaable mein koyi panaah nahi diya jaata, agar tum jaante ho, to batla do
yahi jawaab denge ke Allah hee hai, keh dijiye, phir tum kidhar se jaadu kar diye jaate ho
haq ye hai ke hum ne unhe haq pahoncha diya hai aur ye beshak jhute hai

na to Allah ne kisi ko bete banaya aur na us ke saath aur koyi maboodh hai, warna har maboodh apni maqlooq ko liye liye phirta aur har ek dosre par chad daudta, jo ausaaf ye batlaate hai, un se Allah paak(aur be niyaaz) hai
wo ghaayeb haazir jaanne waala hai aur jo shirk ye karte hai, us se baalaatar hai
